**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 125 2.0 **Prerequisites** [Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316); [Dragon Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=340), [Elemental Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=335), [Plant Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=338), or [Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=333) **Trigger** varies --- You transform reflexively when in danger. You cast [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) to transform into one form granted by one of the prerequisite feats you have, depending on the trigger. Your form's resistances and weaknesses apply against the triggering damage.
  • **Trigger** You fall 10 feet or more; **Effect** Choose a form from [_aerial form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=4).
  • **Trigger** You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage; **Effect** Choose a form from [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88) that resists the triggering damage.
  • **Trigger** You take fire damage; **Effect** Choose a fire elemental form from [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=98).
  • **Trigger** You take poison damage; **Effect** Choose a form from [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=223).
name: Reactive Transformation
prerequisite: Wild Shape; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
